contents.text: Thank you for calling Figure Eight in San Francisco, where we make AI work in the real world.
To speak with our sales team about AI solutions and pricing, press 1.
For pricing details and package options, press 1.
Please hold, and we will connect you to a pricing specialist shortly.

navigationGoals: Get a concise breakdown of service pricing tiers and associated costs
I’m a vet launching a security startup; need detailed pricing on your AI packages.
Get a detailed breakdown of enterprise AI API pricing by usage tier.
I need an explanation of your AI service pricing and any discounts for seniors.
I’d like details on pricing packages and any academic discounts available.

contents.text: To schedule a personalized product demonstration, press 2.
Please hold, and we will connect you to a demo coordinator shortly.

navigationGoals: Book a personalized product demonstration at the earliest available slot
I need to schedule a personalized demo of your AI platform for threat-detection use cases.
Schedule a live technical demo of their model training and deployment workflow.
I’d like to schedule a one-on-one product demo at a time I’ll remember.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo of your AI platform.

contents.text: To reach our support department, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold, and we will connect you to a technical support specialist shortly.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot an integration error with the AI API
I’m experiencing errors integrating your AI tool into my system and need technical support.
Troubleshoot a 500 error in our API integration causing inference failures.
I’m having trouble logging in and need technical support to access my account.
I’m encountering errors with the API—can I get technical support to troubleshoot?

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold, and we will connect you to our billing team shortly.

navigationGoals: Clarify a billing discrepancy and update my payment method
I want to review my latest invoice and update my billing information on my account.
Clarify unexpected overage charges on our monthly API usage invoice.
I have a question about a recent billing charge and need help reviewing my invoice.
I have questions about my recent invoice and billing charges.
